name: Warrior
description: A strong and resilient fighter, skilled in melee combat.

name: Wizard
description: A master of the arcane arts, wielding powerful spells.

name: Rogue
description: A stealthy and agile character, adept at sneaking and dealing critical damage.

name: Cleric
description: A holy warrior, capable of healing and supporting allies.

name: Berserker
description: A fierce warrior who channels rage into devastating attacks.
